content: this unisex half-mitten pattern is a straightforward pattern which has been test knitted by new knitters the mitts are knit in the round the thumb gusset grows from the stitches on needle one using m1l make one left and m1r make one right increases to make the pair you make two identical mitts the beauty of the pattern is that they use one 50g ball to make a pair you may need an additional ball if you want a longer cuff than what is called for in the pattern
